reviewText: I was nervous buying the UK region free version because I wasn't entirely sure what it meant and if it would play on our US Blu-ray DVD player - but it did play fine. The only reason I gave four stars is the Disney movie rewards code is not transferable from UK to US, although the price difference was more than worth it for me.
I UK region coded dvd must not be sold in the US. I bought this by accident, and will not play on my US dvd. So, buyers check pay attention to the country code on the dvds you buy.
Its in a foreign format and I cant get it to play. Very disappointed. Will cost more to return. When I ordered it I specified United States.
